custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: Kyron Mahan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Smart Scaler
custom_nodes.description: A package for intelligent image scaling, aspect ratio adjustments, metadata extraction, and video frame processing for Wan 2.1 vid2vid/img2vid workflows with Pony/SDXL models.

custom_nodes.author: purewater2011
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_color_detection
custom_nodes.description: This plugin adds functionality to ComfyUI for detecting yellow tones in images, making it particularly useful for skin tone analysis and image color evaluation.

custom_nodes.description: a simple prompter for video

custom_nodes.author: San4itos

custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI to save image sequences as video files using FFmpeg. Supports various codecs, audio muxing, and in-node previews.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Step1X-3D

custom_nodes.author: AEmotionStudio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MagnifyGlass
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-MagnifyGlass: A powerful & customizable magnifying glass for ComfyUI. Zoom into canvas details with smooth controls, configurable activation, custom styles (shape, size, border) & WebGL performance.

custom_nodes.author: ratatule2
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LBMWrapper
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-LBMWrapper is a user-friendly interface designed to simplify the integration of lightweight models into your projects. It streamlines workflows by providing essential tools for managing and deploying models with ease.

custom_nodes.author: Sayene
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-base64-to-image-size

custom_nodes.author: magic-eraser-org
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Unwatermark
custom_nodes.description:
ComfyUI-Unwatermark: A ComfyUI custom node to intelligently remove watermarks from images using the unwatermark.ai API.
This custom node for ComfyUI allows you to easily remove watermarks from your images by leveraging the power of the unwatermark.ai API.

custom_nodes.author: JoeNavark
custom_nodes.title: Custom Graph Sigma for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Custom Graph Sigma is a ComfyUI custom node that provides an interactive spline-based curve editor for visually creating and exporting custom sigma schedules. This is especially useful for controlling the noise schedule or custom step values in diffusion models and other workflows that use a sequence of values over time or steps.

custom_nodes.author: SSsnap
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_SSsnap_pose-Remapping
custom_nodes.description: A pose remapping node with support for joint locking, motion-aware scaling, and optional easing - perfect for animation refinement and mech rig control.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen

custom_nodes.description: This project adds high-quality Text-to-Speech capabilities to ComfyUI using the Orpheus TTS model. Create natural-sounding voices with emotional expressions, multilingual support, and audio effects.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Hedra Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates with [a/Hedra](https://www.hedra.com/)'s Character-3 API to generate talking avatar videos from images and audio.

[a/While it already exists in Comfy Core](https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI/blob/80a44b97f5cbcb890896e2b9e65d177f1ac6a588/comfy_extras/nodes_model_advanced.py#L258), it lacks timesteps for adjustment.

custom_nodes.author: matoo

custom_nodes.author: ServiceStack

custom_nodes.description: This node allows downloading models and other resources used within a ComfyUI workflow making it easier to resolve referenced assets and share workflows

custom_nodes.author: charlyad142
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI BFL API Pro Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI provides integration with the BFL (Black Forest Labs) API to enhance and optimize image processing. It allows the use of Flux Pro directly within ComfyUI, offering advanced image processing capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: unicough
custom_nodes.title: OpenAI Image API with gpt-image-1
custom_nodes.description: This custom node uses OpenAI Image API to generate image (if no input image is provided) or edit image (if input image is provided) with the latest gpt-image-1 model. To use it, you will need to provide your OpenAI API key. This makes the node to be friendly for situations where ComfyUi serves as API server, because you don't have to login like the official OpenAI GPT Image 1 node does.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VideoUpscale_WithModel
custom_nodes.description: A memory-efficient implementation for upscaling videos in ComfyUI using non-diffusion upscaling models. This custom node is designed to handle large video frame sequences without memory bottlenecks.
